title.rendered: A-Tech Educator Named Nevada State Teacher of the Year

content.rendered:
Mike Patterson, an educator at CCSD’s Advanced Technologies Academy, has been named the 2025 Nevada State Teacher of the Year! 

Mr. Patterson was selected from five candidates who underwent a rigorous application and interview process. He is an educator who has demonstrated constant dedication and compassion to his students.

The Nevada State Teacher of the Year program celebrates excellence and strengthens the teaching force by honoring and recognizing exceptional teachers on a school, district, state, and national level.
